# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Converts a typed `UnsafePointer` to an opaque C pointer.

## Declaration

```swift
init?<T>(_ from: UnsafePointer<T>?) where T : ~Copyable
```

## Discussion

The result is `nil` if `from` is `nil`.
title: init(_:)
